hi: is there a wiki which says about supported Ubuntu releases ?
as in mailing lists? or what?
No, but lucid-changes isn't something you send mail to. It's an autopost from Launchpad or something.
what is it you're trying to do? (i.e., why were you trying to send that mail?)
That's not going to happen. Ubuntu doesn't upgrade to new major versions of packages after release in most cases. See https://wiki.ubuntu.com/StableReleaseUpdates for the procedure, though.
The 5 year support period applies to the base system and specific packages used frequently on servers (e.g. apache) in main and restricted. sun-java6-* is not one of those packages.
it does not apply to whatever packages you manage to install on an Ubuntu Server installation
